title: "The Sims 4 could use AI to automatically turn photographs into characters"
excerpt: "A patent filed by EA back in April 2020 (and subsequently approved in October 2021) reveals AI technology that could be used in The Sims 4 game to turn pictures of people into in-game characters with just two clicks."
